review: Always on sale... Always.... Why pay $40 for this great game when you could play 5 or 10.Worth every cent.
Get the DLCs makes the game even better and in some aspects easier.
In every aspect, its better then conviction, multiplayer is amazing, tons of great missions. Get... dis... game..!

If you don't like it now, in its ALPHA STATE, then wait untill its done so you don't have to ♥♥♥♥♥ and complain about the ALPHA state its now. If you want to play dayZ without the glitches it has now, wait. If you want to play it with cars, wait.If you want to play DayZ fixed and everything working, don't ♥♥♥♥♥ and complain about how it is now...WAIT UNTILL IT IS FINSIHED
